figure_type.description: String name of valid plot type in ssbuilder.

figure_values.description: Parameters to pass to plotting function.

page_title.description: What to show in the tab title. Default is 'Normal Curve Question'.

out_html_file.description: Name for the HTML file. If not passed, will add '.html' to the question ID.

logging_vars.description: names for the variable types the specific question requires.

confirm_var_name.description: Name for the variable. If not passed, will be question_id + 'confirm' + question_id.

var_name_suffix.description: If true, add question_id to the passed values for all _var_names. Default is true. Can be changed to false if you specify the variable names directly.

pass_through_vars.description: List of variables to pass through from previous to next.

next_question_url.description: Question ID or URL for the Qualtrics survey.

pretty_url.description: If true, make pages like '/IndentiCurve/name/' instead of '/IdentiCurve/name.html'.

full_html.description: Generate a full HTML page or if false, generate only a segment of the page (e.g., for combining or embedding).
